name: Dad Reply
description: Chrome extension that allows for rapid emoji responses to update emails.

name: Solidarity
description: Chrome extension with a single toggle to show everyone is #opentowork.

description: Site that mimics the Figma status, highlighting the issue with always online.

description: A Figma plugin that randomly comments low effort praise on your designs.

description: Resources to get you started when making the inevitable switch to Sketch.

description: Free Sketch plugin that allows you to create and insert SVG QR codes.

name: When to work
description: Find a great time to work together.
